text: White Castle is an American fast food restaurant chain. founded in September 13, 1921 in Wichita, Kansas. It has 345 locations across 13 states. It makes small hamburgers nicknamed "sliders". headquartered in Columbus, Ohio. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:Companies based in Ohio Category:20th-century establishments in Kansas Category:1921 establishments in the United States
title: White Castle (restaurant)
